00119 double detsymm
00120 (
00121         Array2D< double >& amatA,
00122         Array2D< double >& vmatA,
00123         Array  < double >& dvecA
00124 )
00125 {
00126         SIZE_CHECK( amatA.dim( 0 ) == amatA.dim( 1 ) )
00127 
00128         unsigned n = amatA.dim( 0 );
00129     unsigned i;
00130         unsigned j;
00131     double   det;
00132 
00133     // Fill upper triangular matrix:
00134     for( i = 0; i + 1 < n; i++ )
00135         {
00136         for( j = i + 1; j < n; j++ )
00137                 {
00138             amatA( i, j ) = amatA( j, i );
00139                 }
00140         }
00141 
00142     // Calculate eigenvalues:
00143     //eigensymm( amatA, vmatA, dvecA );
00144     eigensymm_obsolete( amatA, vmatA, dvecA );
00145 
00146     for( i = 0; i + 1 < n; i++ )
00147         {
00148         for( j = i + 1; j < n; j++ )
00149                 {
00150             amatA( j, i ) = amatA( i, j );
00151                 }
00152         }
00153 
00154     // Calculate determinate as product of eigenvalues:
00155     for( i = 0, det = 1; i < n; det *= dvecA( i++ ) );
00156 
00157     return det;
00158 }
